column1: 11682713$Sylvan Bladefender$Unlimited$EARTH$[Plant/Effect]$$$$$4$1900$700$$$$When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: You can excavate the top card of your Deck
column2: and if it is a Plant-Type monster
column3: send it to the Graveyard. Otherwise
column4: place it on the bottom of your Deck. If this card is excavated from the Deck and sent to the Graveyard by a card effect: You can add this card from your Graveyard to your hand.$Plant$$Excavates from the player's Deck/Sends excavated cards to the Graveyard/Sends from your Deck to your Graveyard/Changes your Deck order/Places excavated cards on the bottom of the Deck/Places cards from the Deck on the bottom of the Deck/Activates from your Graveyard/Returns itself from Graveyard to hand$Trigger$
